My work on this planet is done.
 The son of perdition,

post_info.post_title: Who is Lucifer? Who is the Devil? Who is Satan?

Unless you mean yourself, Lucifer=Devil=Satan

 
 
 They are all myth.
 
 ON the other hand, the one place where 'lucifier' is mentioned , as a translation in the old testament, it literally means 'morning star' , and is refering to king nebbacanezzer. "Satan", in the old testament, is a title meaning the 'accuser'.. and is given to the angel whose job it is to provide bad choices to mankind (not the soul stealing demigod of christian belief).
No! No! No! Trebor! George Walker Bush is the Satan! And, his good buddy Osama bin Laden is the co-Satan.

Who is lucifer, satan, devil?
 
 We know Jesus of Nazareths understanding of who satan, lucifer devil is.
 
 He is an angel that "fell from heaven like lightening" 
 
 He is the one who tempts you away from God
 
 He is a murderer and the father of lies.
 
 He is the one who takes away the word of Jesus from mens hearts.
 
 
 we know who he is according to those who believed Jesus.
 
 He is the one who "masquerades as an angel of light"
 
 He is the one who "leads the whole world astray"
 
 He is the one who is the "enemy of everything that is right!"
 
 He is the one who will "never stop perverting the right ways of the Lord"
 
 for me, perhaps not you, but for me at least, no one elses opinion on the matter counts for anything 
 
 and you know what is weird, as soon as I posted this post the Rolling Stones song "Sympathy for the devil" came on the radio.
I'm a little confused; was that a testimonial for Jesus or the Rolling Stones?

Who is lucifer, satan, devil?
 
 for me, perhaps not you, but for me at least, no one elses opinion on the matter counts for anything

He is the one who takes away the word of Jesus from mens hearts.
 

 
 Then he is at the heart of every evangelical anti gay church, religious organization, and those with a religious mission statement, such as fof and afa. The catholic church also
